text:
I dont know if this is deliberate or not, but the runant.py script only prints a
message when the launcher.jar isnt found,

I suppose if the JAR is on the classpath you dont care the launcher is missing,
but it seems to me if you cant find the launcher, you shouldnt try executing the
command.

Also, the message doesnt appear until after the java program finishes; think we
need a call to sys.stdout.flush() just before the os.system() call.
creator: stevel@apache.org
bodewig@apache.org
text:
the flush call has been added in svn revision 278150 by yourself.  
I've made the message include the text "Warning" in revision 710055

I'd think this is enough.
